comments.author: mars.martian+bugmail@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 515736
Screenshot of bug with a corrupted view.

Running into bug on a MacBookPro6,2.
It happens on page load on the site http://mehdiisdumb.com/crossword/index.php (you can click "play now" to access the page from the login without providing any credentials).

The screenshot attached is the view I get as a user w/ credentials, however, I can still see the problem without credentials by scrolling one of the clue boxes on the right and looking at the other clue box.

The problem goes away after a second or so.
comments.creator: mars.martian+bugmail@gmail.com

Looks like a regression in beta9 but not beta8, trying to narrow it down further now.
